languages.text: {n}Речь Ирлиэт прерывается странным звуком, похожим на сдавленный вздох, ее взгляд устремлен куда-то мимо вас. Обернувшись, вы понимаете, на что именно — на странный уродливый осколок из пористого материала, выставленный на стене словно трофей. По лицу эльдарки проносится целый калейдоскоп эмоций, слишком быстро сменяющих друг друга, она вздыхает еще раз... а затем чувства на ее лице скрывает непроницаемая бесстрастная маска.{/n} "Что это, мон-кай?" {n}Голос Ирлиэт звучит непривычно сухо.{/n}

{n}Yrliet's words are interrupted by a strange sound similar to a stifled sigh, her gaze trained upon something past you. Turning around, you see what has caught her attention — an odd, unsightly shard of porous material, mounted on the wall like a trophy. An entire kaleidoscope of emotions plays across her face, changing too quickly to catch. She sighs once more... and then her feelings are concealed behind an impenetrable, impersonal mask.{/n} "What is this, mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet's voice sounds unusually cold.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Речь Ирлиэт прерывается странным звуком, похожим на сдавленный вздох, ее взгляд устремлен куда-то мимо вас. Обернувшись, вы понимаете, на что именно — на странный уродливый осколок из пористого материала, выставленный на стене словно трофей. По лицу эльдарки проносится целый калейдоскоп эмоций, слишком быстро сменяющих друг друга, она вздыхает еще раз... а затем чувства на ее лице скрывает непроницаемая бесстрастная маска.{/n} "Что это, мон-кай?" {n}Голос Ирлиэт звучит непривычно сухо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's words are interrupted by a strange sound, sounding like a stifled sigh, her gaze trained upon something past you. Turning around, you understand what that is — an odd, unsightly shard of porous material, mounted on the wall like a trophy. An entire kaleidoscope of emotions is displayed on her face, changing too quickly, she sighs once more... and then her feelings get concealed by an impenetrable, impersonal mask. {/n} "What is this, mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet's voice sounds unusually dry.{/n}

languages.text: {n}某种古怪的声音传来，听起来像是喑哑的叹息。伊莉耶特的话语被这突如其来的奇怪声音打断了。她的目光越过你，望向你身后的某样东西。你转过身，看到了她所看到的东西。那是一块外观丑陋、奇形怪状的多孔碎片，像战利品一样挂在墙上。她的脸上瞬间翻涌起千变万化的情绪，你一时难以判断。伊莉耶特又叹了口气，脸上再次挂上了不近人情的冷漠面具。{/n}“那是什么东西，猴子？”{n}伊莉耶特以异常冰冷的声音开口问道。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are interrupted by a strange sound similar to a stifled sigh, her gaze trained upon something past you. Turning around, you see what has caught her attention — an odd, unsightly shard of porous material, mounted on the wall like a trophy. An entire kaleidoscope of emotions plays across her face, changing too quickly to catch. She sighs once more... and then her feelings are concealed behind an impenetrable, impersonal mask.{/n} "What is this, mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet's voice sounds unusually cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}某种古怪的声音传来，听起来像是喑哑的叹息。伊莉耶特的话语被这突如其来的奇怪声音打断了。她的目光越过你，望向你身后的某样东西。你转过身，看到了她所看到的东西。那是一块外观丑陋、奇形怪状的多孔碎片，像战利品一样挂在墙上。她的脸上瞬间翻涌起千变万化的情绪，你一时难以判断。伊莉耶特又叹了口气，脸上再次挂上了不近人情的冷漠面具。{/n}“那是什么东西，猴子？”{n}伊莉耶特以异常冰冷的声音开口问道。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las palabras de Yrliet se ven interrumpidas por un extraño sonido similar a un suspiro ahogado cuando su mirada divisa algo que tienes detrás. Te das la vuelta y ves lo que ha llamado su atención: un feo y peculiar fragmento de un material poroso, montado sobre la pared sobre una placa de trofeo. Un caleidoscopio de emociones surca el rostro de la Aeldari, cambiando demasiado rápido para apreciarlas. Suspira una vez más... y luego vuelve a ocultar sus emociones tras una máscara impenetrable e impersonal.{/n} «¿Qué es esto, mon-keigh?». {n}La voz de Yrliet se te antoja inusualmente fría.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are interrupted by a strange sound similar to a stifled sigh, her gaze trained upon something past you. Turning around, you see what has caught her attention — an odd, unsightly shard of porous material, mounted on the wall like a trophy. An entire kaleidoscope of emotions plays across her face, changing too quickly to catch. She sighs once more... and then her feelings are concealed behind an impenetrable, impersonal mask.{/n} "What is this, mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet's voice sounds unusually cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras de Yrliet se ven interrumpidas por un extraño sonido similar a un suspiro ahogado cuando su mirada divisa algo que tienes detrás. Te das la vuelta y ves lo que ha llamado su atención: un feo y peculiar fragmento de un material poroso, montado sobre la pared sobre una placa de trofeo. Un caleidoscopio de emociones surca el rostro de la Aeldari, cambiando demasiado rápido para apreciarlas. Suspira una vez más... y luego vuelve a ocultar sus emociones tras una máscara impenetrable e impersonal.{/n} «¿Qué es esto, mon-keigh?». {n}La voz de Yrliet se te antoja inusualmente fría.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet aperçoit soudain quelque chose placé derrière vous et s'interrompt en laissant échapper une sorte de soupir étouffé. En vous retournant, vous découvrez ce qui a attiré son attention : un fragment étrange et laid d'un matériau poreux, accroché au mur tel un trophée. Une myriade d'émotions insaisissables se bousculent sur son visage. Elle pousse un nouveau soupir... et affiche de nouveau un masque imperturbable, dénué de tout sentiment.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que ceci, mon-keigh ? » {n}demande-t-elle d'une voix étonnamment froide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are interrupted by a strange sound similar to a stifled sigh, her gaze trained upon something past you. Turning around, you see what has caught her attention — an odd, unsightly shard of porous material, mounted on the wall like a trophy. An entire kaleidoscope of emotions plays across her face, changing too quickly to catch. She sighs once more... and then her feelings are concealed behind an impenetrable, impersonal mask.{/n} "What is this, mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet's voice sounds unusually cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet aperçoit soudain quelque chose placé derrière vous et s'interrompt en laissant échapper une sorte de soupir étouffé. En vous retournant, vous découvrez ce qui a attiré son attention : un fragment étrange et laid d'un matériau poreux, accroché au mur tel un trophée. Une myriade d'émotions insaisissables se bousculent sur son visage. Elle pousse un nouveau soupir... et affiche de nouveau un masque imperturbable, dénué de tout sentiment.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que ceci, mon-keigh ? » {n}demande-t-elle d'une voix étonnamment froide.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Worte werden durch ein seltsames Geräusch unterbrochen, das an ein gedämpftes Seufzen erinnert, als ihr Blick plötzlich auf etwas hinter dir fällt. Du drehst dich um und siehst, was ihre Aufmerksamkeit erregt hat – ein kleiner, unansehnlicher Splitter eines porösen Materials, der wie eine Trophäe an der Wand aufgehängt ist. In ihrem Gesicht spielt sich ein ganzes Kaleidoskop von Emotionen ab, zu schnell, um sie zu deuten. Sie seufzt ein weiteres Mal ... und dann sind ihre Gefühle hinter einer undurchdringlichen, unpersönlichen Maske versteckt.{/n} "Was ist das, Chem-Pan-Sey?" {n}Yrliets Stimme klingt ungewohnt kalt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are interrupted by a strange sound similar to a stifled sigh, her gaze trained upon something past you. Turning around, you see what has caught her attention — an odd, unsightly shard of porous material, mounted on the wall like a trophy. An entire kaleidoscope of emotions plays across her face, changing too quickly to catch. She sighs once more... and then her feelings are concealed behind an impenetrable, impersonal mask.{/n} "What is this, mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet's voice sounds unusually cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Worte werden durch ein seltsames Geräusch unterbrochen, das an ein gedämpftes Seufzen erinnert, als ihr Blick plötzlich auf etwas hinter dir fällt. Du drehst dich um und siehst, was ihre Aufmerksamkeit erregt hat – ein kleiner, unansehnlicher Splitter eines porösen Materials, der wie eine Trophäe an der Wand aufgehängt ist. In ihrem Gesicht spielt sich ein ganzes Kaleidoskop von Emotionen ab, zu schnell, um sie zu deuten. Sie seufzt ein weiteres Mal ... und dann sind ihre Gefühle hinter einer undurchdringlichen, unpersönlichen Maske versteckt.{/n} "Was ist das, Chem-Pan-Sey?" {n}Yrliet Stimme klingt ungewohnt kalt.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの言葉は押し殺したため息にも似た奇妙な音で遮られた。彼女の視線はあなたの先にある何かに注がれている。振り向くと、彼女が何かに注意を引きつけられた様子が目に入った。戦利品のように壁に取り付けられた、多孔質の奇妙で見苦しい破片だ。彼女の顔には万華鏡のようにさまざまな感情が浮かんでいる。彼女はもう一度ため息をつく…その感情は、人間味のない仮面の向こう側に隠され、推し量ることができない。{/n}「これは何だ、モン＝ケイ？」{n}ユリエットの声は、いつになく冷たく響く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are interrupted by a strange sound similar to a stifled sigh, her gaze trained upon something past you. Turning around, you see what has caught her attention — an odd, unsightly shard of porous material, mounted on the wall like a trophy. An entire kaleidoscope of emotions plays across her face, changing too quickly to catch. She sighs once more... and then her feelings are concealed behind an impenetrable, impersonal mask.{/n} "What is this, mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet's voice sounds unusually cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの言葉は押し殺したため息にも似た奇妙な音で遮られた。彼女の視線はあなたの先にある何かに注がれている。振り向くと、彼女が何かに注意を引きつけられた様子が目に入った。戦利品のように壁に取り付けられた、多孔質の奇妙で見苦しい破片だ。彼女の顔には万華鏡のようにさまざまな感情が浮かんでいる。彼女はもう一度ため息をつく…その感情は、人間味のない仮面の向こう側に隠され、推し量ることができない。{/n}「これは何だ、モン＝ケイ？」{n}ユリエットの声は、いつになく冷たく響く。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in lafı; bastırılmış bir iç çekişe benzeyen, tuhaf bir sesle bölünüyor. Bakışları, arkandaki bir şeye odaklanıyor. Arkanı dönerek dikkatini çeken şeyin ne olduğuna bakıyorsun. İlginç, hoş gözükmeyen, delikli bir parça; duvarda bir ganimet gibi asılı duruyor. Yrliet'in yüzünde beliren duygular, fark edemeyeceğin bir hızla değişip duruyor. Bir kez daha iç çekiyor... Sonra duyguları delinmez, insan dışı bir maskenin ardına saklanıyor.{/n} "Bu ne mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet'in sesi, alışılmadık derecede soğuk geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's words are interrupted by a strange sound similar to a stifled sigh, her gaze trained upon something past you. Turning around, you see what has caught her attention — an odd, unsightly shard of porous material, mounted on the wall like a trophy. An entire kaleidoscope of emotions plays across her face, changing too quickly to catch. She sighs once more... and then her feelings are concealed behind an impenetrable, impersonal mask.{/n} "What is this, mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet's voice sounds unusually cold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in sözleri, bastırılmış bir iç çekişe benzeyen tuhaf bir sesle bölünüyor. Bakışları arkandaki bir şeye odaklanıyor. Arkanı dönerek dikkatini çeken şeyin ne olduğuna bakıyorsun. İlginç, hoş gözükmeyen delikli bir parça duvarda bir ganimet gibi asılı duruyor. Yrliet'in yüzünde yakalanmayacak kadar hızlı bir duygu seli görünüyor. Bir kez daha iç çekiyor... Sonra duyguları delinmez, insan dışı bir maskenin ardına saklanıyor.{/n} "Bu ne mon-keigh?" {n}Yrliet'in sesi alışılmadık derecede soğuk geliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
